Operator haye BITI

|: or [shabihe :| shod :)) ] ^: xor

__builtin_popcount(): tedad 1 ha dar namayeshe binary ra mishemarad

__builtin_clz(): tedad leading zero hara mishemarad (0 haye ghable adad)

__builtin_ctz(): tedad trailing zero hara mishemarad (0 haye samte rAst dar binary ye adad ro mishemarad )

Fenwick Tree:

az oon jayi ke fenwick ro ye chizayi too dore fahmidi man faghat codesho mizanam (ye dor khodet say kon bezani bad biya az ro in bekhon ke kootahe) ahan ye chizi tooye orderesh ye zarib sAbete 1/2 dare bar ax segment ke zarib sabete 4 dasht yani 8x az segment sari tare: *fenwick 1-base hast mesle segment

* * * * * *

int n,fen[N];
void add(int x,int value){
    for(;x<=n;x+=x&-x)
        fen[x]+=value;
}
int get(int x){
    int ans=0;
    for(;x>0;x-=x&-x)
        ans+=fen[x];
    return ans;
}
